import sys

def main():
    nums = sys.stdin.readline().split()
    A = int(nums[0])
    B = int(nums[1])
    num_extensions = 0
    empty_sockets = 1
    while empty_sockets < B:
        num_extensions += 1
        empty_sockets += A - 1
    print(num_extensions)

main()

from math import ceil

A, B = map(int, input().split())

print(ceil(B/A))

socket, num = map(int, input().split())
print(-(-num // socket))

a, b = [int(n) for n in input().split()]
print((b - 1) // a + 1)
